analyzed: ca ati mahā purisaḥ mahā ca sā nadī ca ati mahā nadī mahā ca tam bhayam ca ati mahat bhayam

original: dvittaṃ saṃyoge ca rassattaṃ. Mahāsaddavevacanena mahantasaddenapi vākyaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: saṃyoge ca vākyam dassetum

original: yujjati, mahanto puriso mahāpuriso, mahantī nadī mahānadī, mahantaṃ bhayaṃ mahabbhayanti.
analyzed: yujjati mahantaḥ purisaḥ mahā purisaḥ mahantī nadī mahā nadī mahantam bhayam mahat bhayanti

original: Ca, tasaddehi ca saddhiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ yujjati, mahanto ca so puriso
analyzed: ca ca saddhim paripuṇṇam katvā dassetum yujjati mahantaḥ ca saḥ puriso

original: cāti mahāpuriso, mahantī ca sā nadī cāti mahānadī, mahantañca taṃ bhayañcāti mahabbhayanti.
analyzed: ca ati mahā purisaḥ mahantī ca sā nadī ca ati mahā nadī mahantam ca tam bhayam ca ati mahat bhayanti

original: Mahantasaddo vā mahā hoti, ‘ṭa ntantūna’nti suttena uttarapade pare ntassa sabbassa
analyzed: mahanta saddaḥ vā mahā hoti suttena uttara pade pare ntassa sabbassa

original: attaṃ, mahāvuttinā dīgho ca.
analyzed: attam mahāvuttinā dīghaḥ ca

original: Ettha ca dvīhi casaddehi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sakatthanānāttaṃ dīpeti. Taṃsaddena sakatthanānāttepi
analyzed: ettha ca dvīhi ca saddehi dvinnam padānam sa kattha nānā āttam dīpeti taṃsaddena

original: sakatthānaṃ adhikaraṇabhūtassa dabbatthassa ekattaṃ dīpeti. Imasmiṃ byākaraṇe visuṃ
analyzed: saka tthānam adhikaraṇa bhūtassa dabba atthassa ekattam dīpeti imasmin byākaraṇe visum

original: rūpavidhānakiccaṃ nāma natthi, taṃtaṃsuttavidhānañca tadanurūpaṃ dassitaviggahavākyañca
analyzed: rūpa vidhāna kiccam nāma natthi taṃ taṃ sutta vidhānam ca tad anurūpam dassita viggaha vākyam ca

original: disvā tassa tassa siddhapadassa atthabyañjanavinicchaye ñāte rūpavidhānakiccaṃ siddhaṃ
analyzed: disvā tassa tassa siddha padassa attha byañjana vinicchaye ñāte rūpa vidhāna kiccam siddham

original: hoti, santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso, setahatthī, nīluppalaṃ, lohitacandanaṃ.
analyzed: hoti santaḥ ca saḥ puriso ca ati sappurisaḥ seta hatthī nīluppalam lohita candanam

original: Visadisaliṅga, vacanāpi saddā ekatthā honti, vinayo ca so pariyatti cāti vinayapariyatti,
analyzed: saddāḥ ekatthāḥ honti vinayo ca so pariyatti ca ati vinaya pariyatti

original: vinayo ca so piṭakañcāti vinayapiṭakaṃ, avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
analyzed: vinayo ca so piṭakam ca ati vinaya piṭakam avijjā ca sā paccayaḥ ca ati avijjā paccayo

original: avijjā ca sā nīvaraṇañcāti avijjānīvaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ itthiratanaṃ, sīlañca taṃ guṇo cāti
analyzed: avijjā ca sā nīvaraṇam ca ati avijjā nīvaraṇam evam itthi ratanam sīlam ca tam guṇaḥ ca ati

original: sīlaguṇo, sīlañca taṃ patiṭṭhā cāti sīlapatiṭṭhā iccādi.
analyzed: sīla guṇaḥ sīlam ca tam patiṭṭhā ca ati sīla patiṭṭhā iccādi

original: Tathā vīsati ca sā purisā cāti vīsatipurisā, satañca taṃ purisā cāti satapurisā,
analyzed: tathā vīsati ca sā purisā ca ati vīsati purisā satam ca tam purisā ca ati sata purisā

original: saṅkhārā ca te paccayo cāti saṅkhārapaccayo, aṅgā ca te janapadañcāti aṅgajanapadaṃ,
analyzed: saṅkhārā ca te paccayaḥ ca ati saṅkhāra paccayaḥ aṅgā ca te janapadam ca ati aṅga janapadam

original: magadhā ca te raṭṭhañcāti magadharaṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ kāsiraṭṭhaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: magadhā ca te raṭṭham ca ati magadha raṭṭham evam kāsi raṭṭham iccādi

original: Idha na hoti rū. 341; nī. 681, puṇṇo mantānīputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājā, brahmā sahampati iccādi.
analyzed: idha na hoti puṇṇaḥ mantānīputto cittaḥ gahapati sakkaḥ devarājā brahmā sahampati iccādi

original: Kvaci niccasamāso, kaṇhasappo, lohitamālaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: kvaci nicca samāsaḥ kaṇha sappaḥ lohita mālam iti ādi

original: Visesanuttarapado yathā? Sāriputtatthero, buddhaghosācariyo, ācariyaguttilo vā, mahosadhapaṇḍito, purisuttamo, purisavaro, purisaviseso iccādi.
analyzed: visesana uttara padaḥ yathā sāriputta ttheraḥ buddha ghosa ācariyaḥ ācariya guttilaḥ vā mahosadha paṇḍito purisuttamaḥ purisa varo purisa viseso iccādi

original: Visesanobhayapado yathā? Chinnañca taṃ parūḷhañcāti chinnaparūḷhaṃ, sītañca taṃ uṇhañcāti
analyzed: visesana ubhaya padaḥ yathā chinnam ca tam parūḍham ca ati chinna parūḍham sītam ca tam uṇham ca ati

original: sītuṇhaṃ, khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo. Evaṃ andhabadhiro, katañca taṃ akatañcāti
analyzed: sītuṇham khañjaḥ ca saḥ khujjaḥ ca ati khañjakhujjaḥ evam andha badhiraḥ katam ca tam a katam ca ati

original: katākataṃ, chiddāvachiddaṃ, chinnabhinnaṃ, sittañca taṃ sammaṭṭhañcāti sittasammaṭṭhaṃ,
analyzed: kata akatam chidda avachiddam chinna bhinnam sittam ca tam sammaṭṭham ca ati sitta sammaṭṭham

original: santassa bhāvo saccaṃ, akhemaṭṭhena dukkhañca taṃ aviparītaṭṭhena saccañcāti dukkhasaccaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: santassa bhāvaḥ saccam a khema ṭṭhena dukkham ca tam a viparīta ṭṭhena saccam ca ati dukkha saccam iccādi

original: Upamānuttarapado yathā? Sīho viyāti sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho. Evaṃ munipuṅgavo,
analyzed: upamāna uttara padaḥ yathā sīhaḥ sīhaḥ ca saḥ sīhaḥ ca ati muni sīhaḥ evam muni puṅgavaḥ

original: buddhanāgo, buddhādicco, raṃsi viyāti raṃsi, saddhammo ca so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi.
analyzed: buddha nāgaḥ buddha ādiccaḥ raṃsi viyāti raṃsi saddhammo ca saḥ raṃsi ca ati saddhamma raṃsi

original: Evaṃ vinayasāgaro, samaṇapadumo, samaṇapuṇḍarīko iccādi.
analyzed: evam vinaya sāgaraḥ samaṇa padumaḥ samaṇa puṇḍarīkaḥ iccādi

original: Sambhāvanāpubbapado yathā? Hetu hutvā paccayo hetupaccayo. Evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo,
analyzed: sambhāvanā pubba padaḥ yathā hetu hutvā paccayaḥ hetu paccayaḥ evam ārammaṇa paccayaḥ

original: manussabhūto, devabhūto, dhammo iti saṅkhāto dhammasaṅkhāto, dhammasammato, dhammasaññito,
analyzed: manussa bhūtaḥ deva bhūtaḥ dhammaḥ iti saṅkhātaḥ dhamma saṅkhātaḥ dhamma sammataḥ dhamma saññitaḥ

original: dhammalakkhito, eva iti saṅkhāto saddo evasaddo. Evaṃ casaddo, vāsaddo, ariyabhūto
analyzed: dhamma lakkhitaḥ eva iti saṅkhātaḥ saddaḥ eva saddaḥ evam ca saddaḥ vā a saddaḥ ariya bhūto

original: saṅgho ariyasaṅgho. Evaṃ buddhamuni, paccekamuni iccādi. Ettha ca sambhāvanā nāma
analyzed: saṅghaḥ ariya saṅghaḥ evam buddha muni pacceka muni iccādi ettha ca sambhāvanā nāma

original: sāmaññabhūtassa uttarapadatthassa daḷhaṃ katvā thomanā sarūpavisesadīpanā, na guṇamattadīpanāti
analyzed: sāmañña bhūtassa uttara padatthassa daḷham katvā thomanā sarūpa visesa dīpanā na guṇa matta dīpanā ati

original: adhippāyo. Garū pana “dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi. Evaṃ dhammasaññā, aniccasaññā,
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ pana dhammo iti evam dhamma saññā anicca saññā

original: dhātusaññā, mātusaññā, pāṇasaññitā, attadiṭṭhi” iccādīnipi ettha āharanti, imāni
analyzed: dhātu saññā mātu saññā pāṇa saññi tā atta diṭṭhi iccādīni pi ettha āharanti imāni

original: pana “saraṇaṃ iti gato upagato saraṇaṅgato”ti padaṃ viya itiluttāni paṭhamātappurisapadāni
analyzed: pana saraṇam iti gataḥ upagataḥ padam viya iti luttāni

original: nāma yujjantīti rū. 343; nī. 702.
analyzed: nāma yujjanti iti

original: Avadhāraṇapubbapado yathā? Guṇo eva dhanaṃ na maṇisuvaṇṇādīti guṇadhanaṃ. Evaṃ saddhādhanaṃ,
analyzed: avadhāraṇa pubba padaḥ yathā guṇaḥ eva dhanam na maṇi suvaṇṇa ādi iti guṇa dhanam evam saddhā dhanam

original: sīladhanaṃ, cakkhu eva dvāraṃ na gāmadvārādīti cakkhudvāraṃ. Evaṃ cakkhuvatthu, cakkhundriyaṃ,
analyzed: sīla dhanam cakkhu eva dvāram na gāma dvāra ādi iti cakkhu dvāram evam cakkhu vatthu cakkhu indriyam

original: cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhudhātu, khandhā eva bhārā khandhabhārā. Ettha ca yadi bharitabbaṭṭhena
analyzed: cakkhāyatanam cakkhu dhātu khandhāḥ eva bhārāḥ khandha bhārāḥ ettha ca yadi

original: bhārā nāma siyuṃ, pañcakkhandhā eva bhārā nāma siyuṃ, na sīsabhāra, aṃsabhārādayo.
analyzed: bhārāḥ nāma siyum pañca kkhandhāḥ eva bhārāḥ nāma siyum na sīsa bhāra aṃsa bhāra ādayo

original: Khandhā hi niccabhārā honti, itare tāvakālikā, khandhamūlikā cāti. Evaṃ atisayatthasambhāvanatthaṃ
analyzed: khandhāḥ hi nicca bhārāḥ honti itare tāvakālikā khandhamūlikā ca ati evam ati saya ttha sambhāvana ttham

original: khandhā eva bhārāti avadhāraṇavākyaṃ payujjati, na sīsabhārādīnaṃ sabbaso bhārabhāvapaṭikkhipanatthanti.
analyzed: khandhāḥ eva bhārā ti avadhāraṇa vākyam payujjati na sīsa bhāra ādīnam sabbasas bhāra bhāva paṭikkhipana thanti

original: Evaṃ sabbattha, avijjā eva malaṃ na kaṃsamalādikanti avijjāmalaṃ, avijjā eva āsavo
analyzed: evam sabbattha avijjā eva malam na kaṃsa mala ādikanti avijjā malam avijjā eva āsavaḥ

original: rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi iccādi. Garū pana “dhanaṃ viyāti dhanaṃ, saddhā eva ariyānaṃ
analyzed: rāga aggi dosa aggi moha aggi iccādi dhanam viyāti dhanam saddhā eva ariyānaṃ

analyzed: dhanam saddhā dhanam sattham viyāti sattham paññā eva sattham paññā sattham ti yojenti

analyzed: evam sati atisaya sambhāvanā atthaḥ na sijjhati

original: 347. Nanipātapubbapade nau ka. 326; rū. 341; nī. 707.
analyzed: na nipāta pubba pade nau ka rū nī

original: Ñānubandho paṭisedhamhā aññanakāra nivattanattho, nauiccetaṃ syādyantaṃ aññena syādyantena saha ekatthaṃ hoti. Iminā nañe katthasaññaṃ katvā –
analyzed: ña anubandhaḥ syādi antam aññena syādi antena saha ekattham hoti iminā nañe kattha saññam katvā

analyzed: ṭa nauḥ sa ka rū nī caṃ pā nau bahūsu

original: Uttarapade pare nauiccetassa ṭānubandho a hotīti nassa attaṃ.
analyzed: uttara pade pare nau iti itassa ṭa anubandhaḥ a hoti iti nassa attam

original: Na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo. Ettha siyā – kiṃ vijjamānassa vāyaṃ nisedho, udāhu avijjamānassa
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaḥ a brāhmaṇaḥ ettha siyā kim vijjamānassa vā ayam nisedhaḥ udāhu a vijjamānassa

analyzed: vā ati kiñca ittha yadi vijjamānassa nisedhaḥ evam sati loke vijjamānā sabbe brāhmaṇā

analyzed: abrāhmaṇāḥ nāma bhaveyyum tasmai idha janaḥ na brāhmaṇaḥ tattha janaḥ na brāhmaṇa uti ādinā

analyzed: desa ādi niyamam vinā loke vijjamānassa brāhmaṇassa nisedhaḥ na yujjati atha loke a vijjamānassa

original: nisedho, evañca sati kiṃ avijjamānassa nisedhena nisedhanīyasseva avijjamānattāti?
analyzed: nisedhaḥ evam ca sati kim a vijjamānassa nisedhena nisedhanīyassa iva a vijjamāna ttā ti

original: Vuccate – taṃsadisādiatthesu tabbohārassevāyaṃ nisedho. Tathā hi brāhmaṇasadise abrāhmaṇe
analyzed: vuccate taṃ sadisa ādi atthesu tad bohārassa iva ayam nisedho tathā hi brāhmaṇa sadise abrāhmaṇe

analyzed: kesañci brāhmaṇa saññā saṇṭhāti saññā anurūpaṃ ca brāhmaṇa vohāro tasmin pavattati evam

original: pavattassa abrāhmaṇe brāhmaṇavohārassa ayaṃ paṭisedho hoti. Yathā taṃ? Lokasmiṃ bālajanānaṃ
analyzed: pavattassa abrāhmaṇe brāhmaṇa vohārassa ayam paṭisedhaḥ hoti yathā tam lokasmim bāla janānam

analyzed: micchāsaññā vasena micchāvohāro pavattatiyā iva rūpam attā vedanā attā iccādi tesam

original: 20 iccādi. Ettāvatā suddhabrāhmaṇasaddassapi micchāvasena taṃsadise atthe pavattisambhavo
analyzed: iccādi ettāvatā suddha brāhmaṇa saddassa api micchā vasena tad sadise atthe pavatti sambhavaḥ

analyzed: siddhaḥ hoti nakārassa ca tad attha jotaka matta tā siddhā hoti evañca sati uttara padattha padhāna tā saṅkhātam

original: tappurisalakkhaṇampi idha na virujjhati, tasmā abrāhmaṇoti brāhmaṇasadisoti vuttaṃ
analyzed: tappurisa lakkhaṇam pi idha na virujjhati tasmai abrāhmaṇaḥ ti brāhmaṇa sadisaḥ ti vuttam

analyzed: hoti esa nayo tad añña tad viruddha tad abhāva ttha ādīsu

original: Tattha tadaññatthe –
analyzed: tattha tad aññatthe

original: Saṅkhatā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā dha. sa. dukamātikā 8. Ettha ca na saṅkhatā asaṅkhatā, saṅkhatadhammehi aññe dhammāti attho.
analyzed: saṅkhatāḥ dhammāḥ asaṅkhatāḥ dhammāḥ dha sa duka mātikā ettha ca na saṅkhatā asaṅkhatā saṅkhata dhammehi aññe dhammā ti attho

original: Tabbiruddhe –
analyzed: tad viruddhe

original: Akusalo, kusalapaṭipakkho dhammoti attho.
analyzed: akusalaḥ kusala paṭipakkho dhammaḥ ti attho

original: Tadabhāve –
analyzed: tad abhāve

original: Na katvā akatvā, karaṇena sabbaso vināti attho.
analyzed: na katvā a katvā karaṇena sabbasas vinā iti atthaḥ

original: Duvidho paṭisedho pasajjapaṭisedho, payirudāsapaṭisedho cāti.
analyzed: duvidho paṭisedho pasajja paṭisedho payirudāsa paṭisedho ca ati

original: Tattha attanā yuttapadatthaṃ pasajja laggetvā paṭisedhetīti pasajjapaṭisedho, tadabhāvamattajotako
analyzed: tattha attanā yutta padattham pasajja laggetvā paṭisedha iti iti pasajjapaṭisedho tad abhāva matta jotako

original: nakāro, kriyāmattanisedhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Akatvā, akātuṃ, akaronto, na karoti, na kātabbaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: nakāraḥ kriyā matta nisedhaḥ ti vuttam hoti a katvā a kātum a karontaḥ na karoti na kātabbam iccādi

original: Pasajjamatte aṭṭhatvā taṃsadisādike paritobhāge uggayha nisedhetabbaṃ atthaṃ asati
analyzed: pasajja matte aṭṭhatvā taṃsa disa ādike paritobhāge uggayha nisedhetabbam attham asati

original: khipati chaḍḍetīti payirudāso, taṃsadisādijotako, dabbanisedhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Abrāhmaṇo
analyzed: khipati chaḍḍeti iti payirudāsaḥ taṃsa disa ādi jotakaḥ dabba nisedhaḥ ti vuttam hoti abrāhmaṇo

original: iccādi. Evaṃ asamaṇo, asakyaputtiyo, amitto, mittadhammavidhuroti attho.
analyzed: iccādi evam asamaṇaḥ a sakya puttiyaḥ amittaḥ mitta dhamma vidhuraḥ ti attho
ana sare ka rū nī cam pā

original: Sare pare nauiccetassa ana hoti.
analyzed: sare pare hoti

original: Na ariyo anariyo, ariyadhammavimukhoti attho. Na āvāso anāvāso, na issaro anissaro.
analyzed: na ariyaḥ anariyaḥ ariya dhamma vimukhaḥ ti atthaḥ na āvāsaḥ anāvāsaḥ na issaraḥ anissaraḥ

original: Na īti anīti, ‘ītī’ti upaddavo, na yutto upāyo anupāyo, na ūmi anūmi, na yuttā esanā
analyzed: na īti anīti īti iti upaddavaḥ na yuttaḥ upāyaḥ anupāyaḥ na ūmi anūmi na yuttā esanā

original: anesanā, na yutto okāso anokāso, na atikkamma anatikkamma, anādāya, anoloketvā iccādi.
analyzed: an esanā na yuttaḥ okāsaḥ anokāsaḥ na atikkamma an atikkamma an ādāya an oloketvā iccādi

original: Bahulādhikārā ayuttatthānampi samāso hoti ka. 336; rū. 347; nī. 689, puna na gāyitabbāti
analyzed: bahula adhikārā ayutta tthānam pi samāsaḥ hoti ka rū nī puna na gāyitabbā ati

analyzed: apunageyyā gāthā candam naḥ ullokenti iti a candam ullokikāni mukhāni sūriyam na passanti iti

original: asūriyapassā, rājakaññā, saddhaṃ na bhuñjati sīlenāti asaddhabhojī. Evaṃ alavaṇabhojī,
analyzed: a sūriya passā rāja kaññā saddham na bhuñjati sīlena ati a saddha bhojī evam a lavaṇa bhojī

original: atthaṃ na kāmentīti anatthakāmā. Evaṃ ahitakāmā, okāsaṃ na kāresīti anokāsaṃkāretvā.

analyzed: digu samāsa

original: Paṭhamābahubbīhi
analyzed: paṭhamā bahup bīhi

original: Tattha ‘vasiṭṭhassā’ti etena gottasseva pitubhūtaṃ ādipurisaṃ vadati. Kasmā? Gottasaddattā. Evañhi sati tasmiṃ gotte paccājātā sabbepi janā tassa apaccā nāma honti.
analyzed: tattha vasiṭṭhassa ati etena gottassa iva pitu bhūtam ādi purisam vadati kasmai gotta saddattā evam hi sati tasmin gotte paccājātā sabbe api janā tassa apaccā nāma honti
majjhe ka rū nī

original: Majjhe pavattānaṃ a, yuvaṇṇānaṃ ā, e, ovuddhiyo honti vā kvaci.
analyzed: majjhe pavattānam a yuvaṇṇānam ā e ovuddhiyaḥ honti vā kvaci

original: Vāseṭṭho, vāseṭṭhī, vāseṭṭhaṃ. Vāsaddena “vasiṭṭhassa putto dhītā kula”nti vākyaṃ vā “vasiṭṭhaputto vasiṭṭhadhītā vasiṭṭhakula”nti samāsaṃ vā vikappeti. Evaṃ sabbattha.
analyzed: vāseṭṭhaḥ vāseṭṭhī vāseṭṭham vā saddena vasiṭṭhassa puttaḥ dhītā kulanti vākyam vā vasiṭṭha puttaḥ vasiṭṭha dhītā vasiṭṭha kulanti samāsam vā vikappeti evam sabbattha

original: Bharadvājassa apaccaṃ bhāradvājo, visāmittassa bhāradvājassa… vesāmittassa… (rū.)
analyzed: bharadvājassa apaccam bhāradvājaḥ visāmittassa bhāradvājassa vesāmittassa

original: apaccaṃ vesāmitto, gotamassa apaccaṃ gotamo, kassapassa apaccaṃ kassapo, vasudevassa
analyzed: apaccam vesāmittaḥ gotamassa apaccam gotamaḥ kassapassa apaccam kassapaḥ vasudevassa

original: apaccaṃ vāsudevo. Evaṃ bāladevo.
analyzed: apaccam vāsudevaḥ evam bāladevaḥ

original: Upagussa apaccanti ettha ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ti ṇānubandhe paccaye pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa
analyzed: upagussa a paccanti ettha u vaṇṇassa avaṅa ti ṇa anubandhe paccaye pare u vaṇṇassa avaṅa

original: hoti. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ, manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, bhagguno apaccaṃ bhaggavo,
analyzed: hoti opagavaḥ opagavī opagavam manunaḥ apaccam mānavaḥ bhaggunaḥ apaccam bhaggavaḥ

original: paṇḍuno apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, upavindussa apaccaṃ opavindavo iccādi.
analyzed: paṇḍunaḥ apaccam paṇḍavaḥ upavindussa apaccam opavindavaḥ iccādi

original: 433. Vacchādito ṇānaṇāyanā ka. 345; rū. 366; nī. 754; pā. 4.1.93, 94, 162, 163.
Chaṭṭhuntehi vacchādīhi gottasaddagaṇehi tassa apaccanti atthe ṇānubandhā āna, āyanapaccayā honti vā.
analyzed: cha ṭṭha untehi vaccha ādīhi gotta sadda gaṇehi tassa a paccanti atthe ṇa anubandhāḥ ānaḥ āyana paccayāḥ honti vā

original: Vacchassa apaccaṃ vacchāno, vacchāyano, vacchānī, vacchāyanī, vacchānaṃ, vacchāyanaṃ.
analyzed: vacchassa apaccam vacchānaḥ vacchāyanaḥ vacchānī vacchāyanī vacchānam vacchāyanam

original: Evaṃ kaccāno, kaccāyano, kātiyāno, kātiyāyano, sākaṭāno, sākaṭāyano, kaṇhāno, kaṇhāyano,
analyzed: evam kaccāno kaccāyanaḥ kātiyānaḥ kātiyāyanaḥ sākaṭānaḥ sākaṭāyanaḥ kaṇhānaḥ kaṇhāyanaḥ

original: moggallāno, moggallāyano, aggivessāno aggivessanotipi dissati dī. ni. 1.176; ma.
analyzed: moggallānaḥ moggallāyanaḥ aggivessānaḥ aggivessanaḥ tipi dissati dī ni ma

original: ni. 1.353 ādayo, aggivessāyano, muñcāno, muñcāyano, kuñcāno, kuñcāyano iccādi.
analyzed: ni ādayaḥ aggivessāyanaḥ muñcānaḥ muñcāyano kuñcānaḥ kuñcāyanaḥ iccādi

original: 434. Kattikāvidhavādīhi ṇeyyaṇerā ka. 346; rū. 367; nī. 755; pā. 4.1.120, 123, 126, 127, 128, 129, 131.
analyzed: kattikā vidhavā ādīhi ṇeyya ṇerā ka rū nī pā

analyzed: chaṭṭhī antehi kattikā ādīhi vidhavā ādīhi ca tassa a paccanti atthe kamena ṇa anubandhāḥ eyyaḥ era paccayāḥ honti vā

original: Ṇeyye – kattikāya nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ kattikeyyo, vinatāya nāma deviyā apaccaṃ
analyzed: ṇeyye kattikāya nāma deva dhītāya apaccam kattikeyyaḥ vinatāya nāma deviyāḥ apaccam

analyzed: venateyyaḥ rohiṇiyāḥ nāma deviyāḥ apaccam rohiṇeyyaḥ bhaginiyāḥ apaccam bhāgineyyaḥ

original: nadiyā nāma itthiyā apaccaṃ nādeyyo. Evaṃ anteyyo, āheyyo, kāmeyyo, suciyā apaccaṃ

analyzed: soceyyaḥ bālāya a paccam bāleyyaḥ iccādi

original: Ṇere – vidhavāya apaccaṃ vedhavero, vidhavā nāma matapatikā itthī. Bandhukiyā apaccaṃ
analyzed: ṇere vidhavāya apaccam vedhaveraḥ vidhavā nāma mata patikā itthī bandhukiyā apaccam

analyzed: bandhukeraḥ nāḷikiyā nāma itthiyā putto nāḷikeraḥ samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto sāmaṇero

original: samaṇiyā pavattiniyā dhītā sāmaṇerī iccādi.
analyzed: samaṇiyā pavattiniyā dhītā sāmaṇerī iccādi

original: 435. Ṇya diccādīhi ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 2.4.2; pā. 4.1.85.
analyzed: ṇya dicca ādīhi ka rū nī cam pā

original: Chaṭṭhuntehi ditiiccādīhi tassa apaccanti atthe ṇānubandho yapaccayo hoti vā.
analyzed: cha ṭṭha untehi diti icca ādīhi tassa a paccanti atthe ṇa anubandhaḥ ya paccayaḥ hoti vā

original: 436. Lopovaṇṇivaṇṇānaṃ ka. 261; rū. 369; nī. 509.
analyzed: lopa uvaṇṇi vaṇṇānam ka rū nī

original: Ye pare avaṇṇassa ivaṇṇassa ca lopo hotīti ṇyamhi pare avaṇṇi’vaṇṇānaṃ lopo.
analyzed: ye pare a vaṇṇassa i vaṇṇassa ca lopaḥ hoti iti ṇ yamhi pare a vaṇṇi vaṇṇānam lopaḥ

original: Ditiyā nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ decco, aditiyā apaccaṃ ādicco.
analyzed: ditiyāḥ nāma deva dhītāya apaccam deccaḥ aditiyāḥ apaccam ādiccaḥ

original: Tattha ivaṇṇalope ‘tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi pare tavaggassa cavaggattaṃ, puna ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, kuṇḍaniyā apaccaṃ koṇḍañño.
analyzed: tattha i va ṇ na lope ta vagga vara ṇānam ye ca vagga bayañā ati yamhi pare ta vaggassa ca vagga ttam puna vagga lasehi ta iti yassa

original: 437. Uvaṇṇassāvaṅa sare ka. 348; rū. 371; nī. 757.
analyzed: u va ṇ as āvaṅa sare ka rū nī

original: Sare pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hotīti uvaṇṇassa avattaṃ. ‘Tavaggavaraṇāna…’nti suttena vassa battaṃ, puna ‘vaggalasehi te’ti suttena yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo.
analyzed: sare pare u vaṇṇassa hoti iti u vaṇṇassa avattam suttena vassa battam puna vagga lasehi te ti suttena yassa
ā ṇi ka rū nī cam pā

original: Rassā’kārantato apaccatthe ṇānubandho rassi’paccayo hoti vā.
analyzed: rassa ākāra antataḥ a paccatthe ṇa anubandhaḥ rassi paccayaḥ hoti vā

analyzed: dakkhassa apaccam dakkhi evam doṇi vāsavi sakyaputti nāṭaputti dāsaputti dāruno

analyzed: apaccam dāravi vicāretabbam idam varuṇassa apaccam vāruṇi evam kaṇḍi bāla devi

analyzed: pāvaki jinadattassa apaccam jenadatti suddhodani anuruddhi iccādi

analyzed: rājataḥ ñaḥ jāti yam ka rū nī cam pā

khattā yiyā ka rū nī caṃ pā

analyzed: jātiyam gamyamānā iyam khatta saddamhā a paccatthe yaḥ iya paccayāḥ honti

analyzed: khatta kulassa apaccam khatyaḥ khattiyaḥ

analyzed: jātiyantu eva
manu taḥ ssasaṇa ka rū nī cam   pā

analyzed: jātiyam gamyamānā iyam manu saddamhā a paccatthe ssa saṇa paccayāḥ honti

analyzed: manunaḥ apaccam manussaḥ mānusaḥ manu nāma kappe ādikhattiyaḥ mahāsammata rājā itthiyam manussī mānusī

analyzed: jātiyantu eva māṇavaḥ

original: 442. Janapadanāmasmā janakhattiyā raññe ca ṇo ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 2.4.96; pā. 4.1.168; “janapadanāmasmā khattiyā…” (bahūsu).
analyzed: janapada nāmasmā jana khattiyāḥ raññe ca ṇo ka rū nī caṃ pā janapada nāmasmā khattiyāḥ bahūsu

analyzed: jana vācinā ca khattiya vācinā ca janapada nāmamhā raññe ca a pacce ca ṇaḥ hoti

original: Pañcālānaṃ janānaṃ rājā pañcālo, pañcālassa khattiyassa apaccaṃ pañcālo. Evaṃ kosalo, māgadho, okkāko dī. ni. 1.267.
analyzed: pañcālānam janānam rājā pañcālaḥ pañcālassa khattiyassa apaccam pañcālaḥ evam kosalaḥ māgadhaḥ okkākaḥ

analyzed: kuru sivi saddehi a pacce raññe ca ṇyaḥ hoti

original: Apaccarāsi niṭṭhito.
analyzed: a paccarāsi niṭṭhitaḥ

original: Anekattharāsi
analyzed: anekattharā asi

original: 444. Ṇa rāgā tena rattaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 3.1.1 …pe… 4.2.1.
analyzed: rattam ka rū nī cam pe

original: Rajjanti vatthaṃ etenāti rāgo, rajanavatthu, rāgavācimhā tena rattanti atthe ṇo hoti.

original: Kasāvena rattaṃ vatthaṃ kāsāvaṃ dha. pa. 9, kāsāyaṃ vā. Evaṃ kosumbhaṃ, haliddiyā rattaṃ hāliddaṃ, pāṭaṅgena rattaṃ pāṭaṅgaṃ, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ iccādi.
analyzed: kasāvena rattam vattham kāsāvam kāsāyam vā evam kosumbham haliddiyā rattam hāliddam pāṭaṅgena rattam pāṭaṅgam mañjiṭṭham kuṅkumam iccādi

original: “Nīlaṃ vatthaṃ, pītaṃ vattha”ntiādīsu pana nīla, pītādisaddā guṇasaddattā paccayena vinā guṇanissayaṃ dabbaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ sabbesu guṇasadda, jātisadda, nāmasaddesu.
analyzed: nīlam vattham pītam vatthanti ādīsu pana nīla pīta ādi saddāḥ guṇa sadda ttā paccayena vinā guṇa nissayam dabbam vadanti evam sabbesu guṇa sadda jāti sadda nāma saddesu

original: 445. Nakkhatteninduyuttena kāle ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.5; pā. 4.2.3.

analyzed: nakkhattena ati kim garu gahena lakkhitā ratti

analyzed: indu yuttena ati kim phussena lakkhitaḥ muhuttaḥ

original: Kāleti kiṃ? Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhi.
analyzed: kāla iti kim phussena lakkhitā attha siddhi

original: 446. Sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.18, 19 …pe… 4.2.21-24.
analyzed: sā assa devatā puṇṇamāsī ka rū nī caṃ  pe

original: Sā assa devatā, sā assa puṇṇamāsīti atthe paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
analyzed: sā assa devatā sā assa puṇṇamāsī iti atthe paṭhama antā ṇo hoti

analyzed: buddhaḥ assa devatā iti buddhaḥ yaḥ buddham attanaḥ ārakkha devatam viya garum katvā vicarati

original: nirantaraṃ vā “buddho buddho”ti vācaṃ nicchāreti, tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sugato assa devatāti
analyzed: nirantaram vā buddhaḥ buddha uti vācam tassa etam nāmam sugataḥ assa devatā iti

original: sogato, mahindadevo assa devatāti māhindo. Evaṃ yāmo, somo, vāruṇo.
analyzed: so gataḥ mahinda devaḥ assa devatāti māhindaḥ evam yāmaḥ somaḥ vāruṇaḥ

original: Phussī assa puṇṇamāsīti phusso, māso. Evaṃ māgho, phagguno, citto, vesākho, jeṭṭhamūlo, āsaḷho, sāvaṇo, poṭṭhapādo, assayujo, kattiko, māgasiro.
analyzed: phussī assa puṇṇamāsī iti phussaḥ māsaḥ evam māghaḥ phaggunaḥ cittaḥ vesākhaḥ jeṭṭhamūlaḥ āsaḷhaḥ sāvaṇaḥ poṭṭhapādaḥ assayujaḥ kattikaḥ māgasiraḥ

original: Puṇṇamāsīti kiṃ? Phussī assa pañcamī tithī.
analyzed: puṇṇamāsī iti kim phussī assa pañcamī tithī

analyzed: etesu atthesu dutiya antā ṇo ca ko ca ṇi ko ca ati ete paccayāḥ honti

original: Ṇikamhi-vinayaṃ adhīte jānāti vā venayiko, suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.

analyzed: viyañjanam adhīta iti upari dovārikaḥ sovaggikanti padesu pi duvāre niyuttaḥ suvaggāya

analyzed: eva dvārā iti ca saggāya ati ca kathetabbaḥ

analyzed: tassa visaye dese ka rū nī caṃ pā

original: Tassa desarūpe visaye chaṭṭhuntā ṇo hoti.
analyzed: tassa desa rūpe visaye cha ṭṭhuntā ṇo hoti

original: Thūyamigā vasātino nāma, vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto. Idha adesarūpattā ṇo na hoti, cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ.
analyzed: thūyamigāḥ vasātinaḥ nāma vasātīnam visayaḥ desaḥ vāsāto idha a desa rūpa ttā na hoti cakkhussa visayaḥ rūpam

original: Atha dhātupaccayasaṃsiddhaṃ kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṃ liṅgabhedarahitaṃ kriyāpadhānavācakaṃ tyādyantanāmakaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ dīpiyate.

original: Vadha-hiṃsāyaṃ, vadhitabbanti vajjhaṃ, vijjhitabbanti vijjhaṃ, punanti sujjhanti sattā etenāti puññaṃ, nāgamo.

analyzed: go vuccati ñāṇam saddo ca gavam tāyati rakkhati iti gottam paritas bhayam tāyati rakkhati iti

original: Aṇamhi –
analyzed: a ṇamhi

analyzed: an apaccaya rāsi

ano

original: Avatthāyati etthāti avatthānaṃ, dīyate dānaṃ, diyyati etenāti vā dānaṃ, sammā padīyati assāti sampadānaṃ, apecca ādadāti etasmāti apādānaṃ.

original: Passīyate passanaṃ, dassanaṃ, suṭṭhu passatīti sudassanorājā, suṭṭhu passitabbanti sudassanaṃ-devanagaraṃ, sandassanaṃ, nidassanaṃ, dhāraṇaṃ, uddhāraṇaṃ, niddhāraṇaṃ, ādidīgho.

analyzed: sammajjanam sammajjā apecca vajanam gamanam pabbajjā caraṇam cariyā paricaraṇam pāricariyā ū byañjanassa ati ī āgamaḥ rassaḥ ca

original: Jāgara-niddakkhaye, jāgaraṇaṃ jāgariyā, seti etthāti seyyā, dvittaṃ.

original: Parihaññatīti paligho, rassa lattaṃ. Patihanatīti paṭigho, tassa ṭattaṃ. Bhuso hanati
analyzed: parihaññati iti palighaḥ rassa lattam patihanati iti paṭighaḥ tassa ṭattam bhusaḥ hanati

original: bādhatīti aghaṃ-dukkhaṃ pāpañca, visesena bhuso hanatīti byaggho, diṭṭhi, sīlasāmaññena
analyzed: bādhati iti agham dukkham pāpam ca visesena bhusaḥ hanati iti byagghaḥ sīla sāmaññena

original: saṃhatoti saṅgho-samūho, devasaṅgho, brahmasaṅgho, migasaṅgho, ohanati adhobhāgaṃ
analyzed: saṃhatā iti saṅghosamūhaḥ deva saṅghaḥ brahma saṅghaḥ miga saṅghaḥ adhobhāgam

original: katvā māretīti ogho, kilesogho, saṃsārogho, udakogho.

original: Suttavibhattiyā aññatopi gho hoti, mātaraṃ hanatīti mātugho. Evaṃ pitugho iccādi.
analyzed: sutta vibhattiyā aññatas pi ghaḥ hoti mātaram hanati iti mātu ghaḥ evam pitu ghaḥ iccādi
ṇu ādayaḥ ka rū nī

original: Kriyatthā bhāvakārakesu ṇuādayo honti, upari vuccamāno sabbo ṇvādikaṇḍo imassa suttassa niddeso hoti, tasmā idha kiñcimattaṃ vuccate.

original: Karotīti kāru-sippī, ayati vaḍḍhatīti āyu, ayanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti vā āyu-jīvitaṃ,
analyzed: karoti iti kārusippī ayati vaḍḍhati iti āyu ayanti vaḍḍhanti sattāḥ etena ati vā āyu jīvitam

original: sobhāvisesaṃ rahanti jahanti canda, sūriyā etenāti rāhu-asurindo, hitasukhaṃ sādhetīti
analyzed: rahanti jahanti canda sūriyāḥ etena ati rāhu asuḥ indo hita sukham sādha iti iti

original: sādhu-sappuriso, vāyatīti vāyuvāto iccādi.
analyzed: sādhu sappurisaḥ vāyati iti vāyuvātaḥ iccādi

original: Iti rīrikkhādipaccayarāsi.
analyzed: iti rīrikkha ādi paccaya rāsi

original: Pakatirūparāsi niṭṭhito.
analyzed: niṭṭhito

original: Iti niruttidīpaniyā nāma moggallānadīpaniyā
analyzed: iti niruttidīpaniyā nāma moggallānadīpaniyā

original: Tabbādikaṇḍo nāma kitakaṇḍo niṭṭhito.
